title: artifact
description: The Artifact Object permits capturing an array of bytes (8-bits), as a base64-encoded string string, or linking to a file-like payload.

type.description: The value of this property MUST be `artifact`.

mime_type.description: The value of this property MUST be a valid MIME type as specified in the IANA Media Types registry.

payload_bin.description: Specifies the binary data contained in the artifact as a base64-encoded string.

url.description: The value of this property MUST be a valid URL that resolves to the unencoded content.

hashes.description: Specifies a dictionary of hashes for the contents of the url or the payload_bin.  This MUST be provided when the url property is present.

encryption_algorithm.description: If the artifact is encrypted, specifies the type of encryption algorithm the binary data  (either via payload_bin or url) is encoded in.

decryption_key.description: Specifies the decryption key for the encrypted binary data (either via payload_bin or url).

..\\common\\cyber-observable-core.json.title: cyber-observable-core
..\\common\\cyber-observable-core.json.description: Common properties and behavior across all Cyber Observable Objects.

type.description: Indicates that this object is an Observable Object. The value of this property MUST be a valid Observable Object type name, but to allow for custom objects this has been removed from the schema.

spec_version.description: The version of the STIX specification used to represent the content in this cyber-observable.

object_marking_refs.description: The list of marking-definition objects to be applied to this object.

granular_markings.description: The set of granular markings that apply to this object.

defanged.description: Defines whether or not the data contained within the object has been defanged.

id.description: Specifies the identifier of the observable object, as a string.

extensions.description: Specifies any extensions of the object, as a dictionary.

..\\common\\identifier.json.title: identifier
..\\common\\identifier.json.description: Represents identifiers across the CTI specifications. The format consists of the name of the top-level object being identified, followed by two dashes (--), followed by a UUIDv4.

..\\common\\granular-marking.json.title: granular-marking
..\\common\\granular-marking.json.description: The granular-marking type defines how the list of marking-definition objects referenced by the marking_refs property to apply to a set of content identified by the list of selectors in the selectors property.

selectors.description: A list of selectors for content contained within the STIX object in which this property appears.

lang.description: Identifies the language of the text identified by this marking.

allOf.description: The marking_ref property specifies the ID of the marking-definition object that describes the marking.

..\\common\\binary.json.title: binary
..\\common\\binary.json.description: The ​binary data type represents a sequence of bytes. In order to allow pattern matching on custom objects, for all properties that use the binary type, the property name MUST end with '_bin'. The JSON MTI serialization represents this as a base64-­encoded string as specified in RFC4648​. Other serializations SHOULD use a native binary type, if available.

..\\common\\hex.json.title: hex
..\\common\\hex.json.description: The hex data type encodes an array of octets (8-bit bytes) as hexadecimal. The string MUST consist of an even number of hexadecimal characters, which are the digits '0' through '9' and the letters 'a' through 'f'.  In order to allow pattern matching on custom objects, all properties that use the hex type, the property name MUST end with '_hex'.

..\\common\\url-regex.json.title: url-regex
..\\common\\url-regex.json.description: Matches a URI according to RFC 3986.

..\\common\\hashes-type.json.title: hashes
..\\common\\hashes-type.json.description: The Hashes type represents one or more cryptographic hashes, as a special set of key/value pairs

^MD5$.description: Specifies the MD5 message digest algorithm.

^SHA-1$.description: Specifies the SHA-1 (secure-hash algorithm 1) cryptographic hash function.

^SHA-256$.description: Specifies the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function (part of the SHA2 family).

^SHA-512$.description: Specifies the SHA-512 cryptographic hash function (part of the SHA2 family).

^SHA3-256$.description: Specifies the SHA3-256 cryptographic hash function.

^SHA3-512$.description: Specifies the SHA3-512 cryptographic hash function.

^SSDEEP$.description: Specifies the ssdeep fuzzy hashing algorithm.

^TLSH$.description: Specifies the TLSH locality-sensitive hashing algorithm.

..\\common\\dictionary.json.title: dictionary
..\\common\\dictionary.json.description: A dictionary captures a set of key/value pairs
